name: Neutron Star
description:
Try out the DEMO! You can unlock up to the second level.

NEUTRON STAR is a fast-paced score-attack game, with a big focus on cool weapons. Every time you pick up a weapon, your score increases. Collect enough and you'll add another weapon to your collection!

You can see (and use!) your collection in the arsenal. Try to collect them all!

  • Over 70 unlocks! (50 are weapons!)
  • Controller support!
  • Hours of fun!

I hope you enjoy the game as much as I enjoyed making it. Please vote for the game on greenlight! It really helps.
